DOC.brief_summary: The aims of the study: To evaluate whether the use of a specific TENS technology can improve GERD symptoms and esophageal acid exposure.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Non Invasive Electrical Stimulation Therapy on Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD) Symptoms - Proof of Concept Study
DOC.criteria: at least 3 episodes of heartburn and/or regurgitation in a week for at least 3 months. evidence for an abnormal esophagal acid exposure on impedancepH monitoring (tested in the last 2 years off PPI) gastric or esophagal surgery active peptic ulcer disease malignancy pregnancy uncontrolled diabetes mellitus severe cardiac conditions such as cardiac arrhythmia or ischemia or cardiac pacemaker/defibrillator allergy to adhesives/patches severe pulmonary disease obesity (BMI>30)
